page.title: 11LUDFORD
page.content: Whilst only 20 % of Ludford is in this Grid area it contains several features vital to the Community _ Parish Church Primary School, a Public House, the White Hart & a Fish & Chip Shop. The village nestles in a dip on the top of the Wolds and despite an illusion of trees, has few and is always open to the winds. Within this part of the village are 49 adults & 13 children in 25 households of which 17 are on the telephone & 20 have cars. No public housing (Council Houses), all housing being privately owned, some rented but the majority owner_occupied _ mixture of old Farmhouses, Victorian and pre_ W.W.I houses and cottages and about 30% modern post W.W.2. bungalows and houses.
